title: Lonely Blade IV
description: Lonely Blade continues to fight alone, hoping to finally discover who is responsible for killing his brother.
altHero: Lonely Blade, our hero, weilding a double edged blade
alt1: Lonely Blade boomerangs his blade across a courtyard
alt2: the janitor holding a mop sword
alt3: Lonely Blade looking up in the rain
alt4: the janitor yelling as he jumps and attacks
